about_the_game:
Join the world of "Ronia's Guardians" and experience a unique strategic adventure! Strategically place your towers, empower the Head Wizard, battle against dark forces striving to destroy Ronia.

Remember, only one person can stop this ancient war. The fate of Ronia lies in your hands!

Tower Construction and Strategy Choice



In this magical game, you are the one determining Ronia's destiny! You can choose a card to build a tower or opt for special card options to enhance the abilities of your Wizard. However, remember that both the Ronians and the Wizard have limited attributes.

All strategic decisions are under your control! Will you construct towers or prefer to choose cards that empower your Wizard? The choices you make will shape Ronia's future!

Select the most suitable and impressive cards, devise your strategy, and make a difference in this enchanted world! Can you save Ronia from this dark period?

Evolvable Towers



When you select multiple towers of the same type, they all progress together!
Once you upgrade towers of the same type to level 5, you will witness their Perfect Evolution!

The Last Remaining Head Wizard



The Wizard provides support in areas where towers fall short, adding depth to your strategy with their unique abilities!

Story



Ronia stands as a realm where the Ronians have thrived in harmony and abundance over many years. Their existence revolves around four ancient and majestic trees, each embodying an essential element: fire, water, earth, and air. These trees serve as the foundation of life in the realm.However, a great war between Ardhanir, Skyrendar, and Gelidorah leaves Ronia facing an unexpected threat. The Ronians, including the Tree Guardians, send all their armies to end the war, unaware that dark forces may take advantage of their absence, leaving the four ancient trees vulnerable.

Dark forces comprised of Fire, Earth, Air, and Water elements seizes the opportunity to advance towards the trees in the absence of Ronian armies. The Council convenes an urgent meeting to protect their realm from this danger. However, they feel hopeless as they lack armies to fight back.

Engineers, alchemists, farmers, and wizards rekindle their hopes and start building towers to protect Ronia. The Head Wizard strives to halt the dark forces with their abilities and courage.

short_description: Ronia's Guardians is a tower defense game enriched with rogue-like features. You'll construct towers and utilize abilities tailored to your preferences. Protect the mystical quartet of ancient trees, with each tree representing a sacred element - fire, water, earth, and air - brought to life.
